entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being held captive by Voldemort and his Death Eaters. (Excerpt: 'ormtail approached Harry...')

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: One of Voldemort's followers, who helps to free Harry from his bonds. (Excerpt: 'Wormtail raised his new silver hand...')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who is leading the Death Eaters and holding Harry captive. (Excerpt: 'You have been taught how to duel, Harry Potter? said Volde-')

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person whose body lies nearby, and whose wand is later retrieved by Wormtail for Harry. (Excerpt: 'Wormtail walked out of the circle to the place where Cedric’s body lay...')

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers who are loyal to Voldemort and are surrounding Harry. (Excerpt: 'the Death Eaters closed ranks...')

relationships.description: Wormtail helps Harry by freeing him from his bonds. (Excerpt: 'Wormtail raised his new silver hand...')
Wormtail is a follower of Voldemort, who is leading the Death Eaters. (Excerpt: 'You have been taught how to duel, Harry Potter? said Volde-')
Wormtail retrieves Cedric's wand for Harry. (Excerpt: 'Wormtail walked out of the circle to the place where Cedric’s body lay...')
The Death Eaters are loyal followers of Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'the Death Eaters closed ranks...')
